amendment.description: Amendment transfers $1 million from the San Francisco Muni Third Street Light Rail Project to the Silicon Valley Rapid Transit Corridor Project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $1 million in funding (by transfer) for the Silicon Valley Rapid Transit Corridor Project in San Jose, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Honda.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Honda amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
